20110125024224.000|20110125024226.000|CC1|THE ACCUMULATION OF FLUIDS IN   
20110125024226.000|20110125024228.000|CC1|THE BRAIN OCCURS WHEN A BULLET  
20110125024228.000|20110125024230.000|CC1|PENETRATES THE SKULL MAKING THE 
20110125024230.000|20110125024231.000|CC1|BRAIN BLEED OR SWELL.

20110125024232.000|20110125024234.000|CC1|DOCTORS HAVE LIKELY INSERTED A  
20110125024234.000|20110125024236.000|CC1|DRAIN INTO A HOLE IN HER SKULL. 
20110125024236.000|20110125024238.000|CC1|>> PRESSURE BUILT UP PERHAPS TOO

20110125024240.000|20110125024242.000|CC1|ACCOMMODATE, WHICH COULD CAUSE

20110125024243.000|20110125024245.000|CC1|HERNIATION, AND THAT COULD MEAN 
20110125024245.000|20110125024245.000|CC1|A VERY RAPID DEMISE.            
20110125024245.000|20110125024247.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT COULD BE A      
20110125024247.000|20110125024248.000|CC1|COUPLE OF WEEKS BEFORE DOCTORS  
20110125024248.000|20110125024251.000|CC1|DETERMINE IF THIS IS A TEMPORARY
20110125024251.000|20110125024252.000|CC1|ACCUMULATION OF FLUID OR IF IT  
20110125024252.000|20110125024254.000|CC1|IS MORE SERIOUS, REQUIRING A    
20110125024254.000|20110125024256.000|CC1|PERMANENT SHUNT TO DRAIN FLUID. 
20110125024256.000|20110125024257.000|CC1|THIS IS NOT UNCOMMON FOR SOMEONE
20110125024257.000|20110125024300.000|CC1|SUFFERING THIS KIND OF WOUND
